long_description: Can't live without your coffee? Keep your fresh brew hot for up to 24 hrs. with the rugged 44.8 fl. oz. Stanley Classic Vacuum Bottle. Stainless-steel, BPA-free construction stands up to rough days on the trail and at the work site; interior has no liners or coatings. Vacuum insulation keeps beverages hot or cold for up to 24 hrs. Insulated lid doubles as an 11 fl. oz. drinking cup. Leakproof stopper locks liquids inside; twist the stopper open and pour from any angle. Hefty handle is easy to grab with gloves on; handle locks down for easy packing. Stanley Classic Vacuum Bottle holds up to 44.8 fl. oz. (1.3 liters). Closeout.
short_description: Can't live without your coffee? Keep your fresh brew hot for up to 24 hrs. with the rugged 44.8 fl. oz. Stanley Classic Vacuum Bottle.
